short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge manga websites with manga reader mode and many exciting features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Core features:
- Manga reader mode:
  + Inject directly into the web page when reading manga
  + Long strip, single page, double page
  + Vertical, left to right, right to left
  + Autoplay with configurable speed
  + Zoomimg, dragging, full-screen, etc
  + Ad-Free
- Auto save reading history across all sites
- Keep track of new releases, with notifications

How to use:
1. Read a chapter on a compatible site, the reader mode is injected automatically into the web page. The list of compatible sites can be viewed on the extension popup.
2. Click Add to library button to add to your library and start tracking.
